text:
This pull request fixes the "TypeError: argument of type 'NoneType' is not iterable" that was caused by calling the openid_connect validate_authorization method with a request where request.scopes was
set to None (fixes #436).
title: Fix TypeError in openid_connect
clean_text: thi pull request fix typeerror argument type nonetyp iter caus call openidconnect validateauthor method request requestscop set none fix 436

text:
Fix TypeError in openid_connect

This commit fixes the "TypeError: argument of type 'NoneType' is not
iterable" that was caused by calling the openid_connect
validate_authorization method with a request where request.scopes was
set to None.
clean_text: fix typeerror openidconnect thi commit fix typeerror argument type nonetyp iter caus call openidconnect validateauthor method request requestscop set none
